p: As the ring B in the above formula (7), there can be exemplified an aliphatic ring, an aromatic ring and a heterocyclic ring having 5 to 7 elements forming a ring. The ring B may have an alkyl group such as methyl group as a substituent. As the heterocyclic ring, further, there can be exemplified the one having 1 to 2 hetero atoms such as oxygen atoms, nitrogen atoms or sulfur atoms. Preferred examples of the ring B are as shown below.
